{"title": "Pinball Ride Unlimited", "title_search": "pinball ride unlimited", "title_keyword": "pinball ride unlimited", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/pinball-ride-unlimited/", "summary": "Pinball Ride Unlimited -- Pinball Ride is a pinball game that lets you compete against Facebook friends.  This is the unlimited edition of the game. If you haven't tried the game yet we suggest you try our free version of the game. --  Pinball Ride is an original pinball game with an online competition system and social features, built exclusively for the iPhone and iPod Touch.  The goal of the game is to reach the highest score within the limit of a number of given balls. To build this high score, you must progress through various challenges and unlock Jackpots offered by the table. Precision and focus are key to your success.  The game offers a long list of challenges you will have to pass to maximize your score, using targets, bumpers, ramps. It also provides the classic rewards of "multi-balls" and "extra ball".  Facebook Connect allows you to compete against your Facebook friends. It gives players their rank based on score, and lets them compare their game profiles. You can also share game stories directly through the game itself.  Pinball Ride reproduces the physics of a real pinball machine that will please pinball fans, and runs at a very smooth frame rate to render an authentic feel. For instance, flipper controls are precisely tuned to replicate the feel of real pinball and make the game easy to learn but hard to master.  Pinball Ride features a unique table with an original universe and offers story progression through an illustrative style. The style is supported by an original soundtrack created exclusively for the table. {"title": "Jounce", "title_search": "jounce", "title_keyword": "jounce", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/jounce/", "summary": "Full version FREE til 3/29/2010 to celebrate PAX East.  Jounce is a nearly infinite Music Puzzle Game, featuring over 32000 music generating levels and Open Feint support.  Read on, as I try to find a way to explain it in text.   First off, the most requested feature, deleting Bouncers, is in the next update which is currently going through our final QA and will be submitted soon (yes, I do listen, I'm just a bit slow at times)   So what is Jounce? It is the result of my boredom. More specifically, it is a Musical Puzzle Game, so let's call it an MPG (yay, new acronym!)  Balls fall from above, and you place bouncers with a flick of your finger to direct them around obstacles towards the goal somewhere along the bottom.  Technically, there's no music in Jounce though.  So where does the M in MPG come from? Each time a ball hits a bouncer, it plays a sound, there are about 2 octaves worth of sounds the bouncers select from when you create them, so you end up with this cool generative music thing going on.   If you've bothered to read this far, I guess that means you're probably at least somewhat interested in Jounce, so if you haven't yet, why not go ahead and buy it now? I'll wait till you're done to continue...ready? Ok.   I don't care for games that have you trying for the fewest moves, because that puts a hard cap on just how good you can be.  With Jounce, I took the opposite tack: each bounce increases a balls value by one point, so to really rack up a high score, besides getting the balls to reach the goal, you have to make them bounce.  A Lot. Like an entire room full of kids on a massive sugar high.   The controls are pretty simple: Just tap and drag to place a bouncer.  Want to remove a bouncer? Now you can! Just tap on one once to select it (turns red) then tap again to remove it.  Tapping or dragging anywhere else will unselect it. {"title": "Backgammon NJ", "title_search": "backgammon nj", "title_keyword": "backgammon nj", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/backgammon-nj/", "summary": "IMPORTANT - READ THIS FIRST Please DO NOT buy this game unless you are willing to use both of the features we have included in the game to prove that it does not cheat, Manual Rolls and the ability to print out dice rolls before you start a game. ABOUT BACKGAMMON NJ Backgammon NJ is a full-featured backgammon game which uses an advanced, neural network-based, artificial intelligence. Players of all skill levels can match wits against a computer opponent or play against another person in 2-player mode on a single device. Discriminating players will appreciate how well the AI plays. It uses a neural network trained on millions of positions, a bearoff database, and a match equity table to achieve strong gameplay that will challenge even expert players. {"title": "Sudoku Elmundo.es", "title_search": "sudoku elmundoes", "title_keyword": "sudoku elmundoes", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/sudoku-elmundo-es/", "summary": "Did you know that El Mundo was the first newspaper to bring Sudoku to Spain? Now elmundo.es brings to iPhone and iPod Touch the best Sudoku game available for mobile. {"title": "Phrase Party!", "title_search": "phrase party", "title_keyword": "phrase party", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/phrase-party/", "summary": "We’re having a party and you’re invited! So come along and join the fun with this fast-paced and exciting new app for your iPhone or iPod Touch. Never before has so much fun been so multi-functional, convenient, and easy to use.  - Phrase Party! is guaranteed to make even the biggest party poopers come to life and join the fun. It all starts with a few of your closest friends getting together and choosing sides. As long as there are 2 team members on each side, let the party begin. Each side takes turns trying to describe the phrase on the screen to their teammates. When that team answers correctly, Phrase Party! is passed to the next team. Play continues until the buzzer sounds and the team who’s left holding the device is declared the loser of that round. With up to 4 teams competing, this game can get interesting in a hurry! - With Phrase Party! on your iPhone or iPod Touch, it will seem that wherever you are, that's where the party is. Whether you’re entertaining friends at home, on your lunch break, or just on a road trip, Phrase Party! has such a large variety of topics to choose from there’s bound to be a subject to suit everyone’s taste. Pick from any 25,000 possible phrases and one or more of the 9 categories which include: The World, Sports and Games, Places, Entertainment, Science and Technology, Food, College, Sayings; or just go for broke and select a mixed bag of phrases with the “Everything” category.  - Customize your phrase list to appeal to even the youngest of players. The custom phrases will be loaded automatically along with the Everything list. Use the advanced category selection feature to load only custom phrases. On the advanced category selection screen, you can easily turn off phrases with alcohol related questions, or other references that may be inappropriate for younger players.  - This app is a wonderful learning tool for parents, teachers, and caregivers alike to help motivate the minds of younger ones.  By thinking out of the box, and onto your iPhone or iPod Touch, you decide what information would be helpful to reinforce what they already know while you help promote their natural curiosity for learning.  - Phrase Party!  has so many different settings you'll never have to play the same game twice. You can easily customize and enter team names, change the timer length, customize points per game, and even install a visual timer to help you see how much time you have left before you are declared the victor in this war of words. The personalization doesn’t end there; Phrase Party! now has 3 different gaming modes:  (1.) The Classic Version – the one you know and love. (2.) Race Mode – In this team-play mode, teams compete as one, trying to guess the most phrases in the time allowed before handing it off to their opponents. (3.) Party Mode – This new mode is a unique way for many people to play a fun casual game. No official teams or scoring is used--- just partying.  Whether you prefer the classic mode, party mode, or to customize it to your own liking, you are not going to find more fun on any other single app. With Phrase Party! {"title": "Math Mind", "title_search": "math mind", "title_keyword": "math mind", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/math-mind/", "summary": "Math Mind is a funny Memory-like matching game with a mathematical background. It helps children and adults to practice their basic math skills. The game is designed to entertain preschoolers, challenge kids and train the brain of adults.  Math Mind is a fun way to help your kid to practice his or her single or double digit addition skills. You may show them in Brazooka Soccer.This is a free kick challenge game. In each challenge you will have 3 chances to shoot the ball the nearest to the target as you can. {"title": "Cubik", "title_search": "cubik", "title_keyword": "cubik", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/cubik/", "summary": "OVERVIEW --------------------------  Break 'em! Break 'em ALL!  We are unsure as to the reasoning behind this apparently natural need to break these Cubes. Perhaps it's because we can.  Cubik is a quick and easy game to learn and play. Be forewarned that some have referred to the gameplay as "painfully addictive". (They really said that, I'm not making it up)  These Cubes must be destroyed. It’s a dirty job but someone has got to do it! The task is quite literally in your hands.  Do your best to gather Energy Points by memorizing Cube colors and tapping the central Cubes in the same order. Tilt your device to navigate around the Cube cluster in this fully 3D environment to find the Cubes you need. Find Power Upgrades. Find Power Surges.  Use these acquired Powers and your down right awesome skill to quickly destroy the Cubes before too many enter the screen and overload the system!   FEATURES --------------------------  - Adjustable settings allow you to exploit your own natural skills of memorization and recall. - Adjustable Gear Icon can be moved to your preferred side, just in case you like playing with the other hand.  - Progressive design elements allow you to become better with every play.  - Set your "Play Position" to which ever angle you like and at any time. You like to play while standing on your head? No problem. While posing for a catalog stretched out sideways? No problem. In bed? Definitely no problem!  - Enjoy your own music while breaking Cubes with or without the sounds of smashing. We always thought that song should have some shatter in it.  GAMEPLAY --------------------------  Hold your finger on the Gear icon to generate a color Cube sequence. Memorize the Cubes as they are displayed in realtime. Memorize three or thirty, it's your choice depending on the size of your cranium. Stuff your brain with these Cubes then tap the central Cubes in the same order as memorized to gather Energy Points.  Meanwhile, more Cubes are entering your screen at an increasing rate. Use your acquired Energy Points to shatter those Cubes and maintain a reasonable number of on-screen Cubes. MOre than six of any color will overload the system, at which time you'll have only a few short seconds to eradicate the issue.   Your success is not entirely reliant on your short-term memory, you may find help from within. During the act of smashing Cubes into oblivion and scattering they're fragmented shards across a void of vast emptiness, certain advantages may present themselves.  Power Spikes attach themselves to the hull of your Cube Display to increase the amount of Energy taken from each Cube in a repeat sequence. These neat little helpy helpers will also remain attached from game to game, right by your side like a faithful companion. Make too many mistakes and they may jump ship, so be careful.  Power Surges are the most fun to use. They grant an ability of mass Cube destruction. Once found, Surges will sit and wait in their holding mechanism until you decide to facilitate their power. Drag them over and plug them in. A spectacle of fading Cube fragments is only a gentle shaking away.  Have fun.   FUTURE --------------------------  I will be paying close attention to ALL the players of Cubik. I thank you for purchasing the game and I feel an obligation to make it the best experience it can be. Your feedback is of great importance to me, so please feel free to leave comments and/or email me with your thoughts.  Future updates with additional content are already in development. So increase your high scores before this game gets real hot and everyone has it. Then you can say, "Oh what, Cubik? I've been playing that for days! Check out my number of broken Cubes."  Thanks, HallwayLight", "genre": ["Arcade"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-10-21", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-132081-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-132081-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["HallwayLight (Developer)", "HallwayLight (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "MUST.EAT.BIRDS.", "title_search": "musteatbirds", "title_keyword": "musteatbirds", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/must-eat-birds/", "summary": "-- On sale for a limited time! -- Play MUST.EAT.BIRDS! The worlds first ever picnic defence simulator. An innocent monster's glorious spread of sponges is under imminent threat from a parachuting avian invasion - they've come for the cake and they don't intend to share. Only you can save the day! Fire Nomster at the greedy birds using his hastily constructed catapult and defend your sweet treats down to the last crumb. With nine mission stages, four challenge stages, individual achievements and a whole cast of Battenburg snaffling birds, Must. Eat. Birds is bursting with goodness, and value for money. For those about to bake - we salute you. --- FEATURES --- - 9 unique missions - 6 different enemy types - Mission grading and ranking - Score combo and bonus system - Special MAXIMUM BAKE mode - 4 unlockable open ended challenges - Special cake awards to win - Super cute original graphics - Catchy theme tune and sound effects - Challenge friends over email - Addictive, original game play! --- REVIEWS --- "If you find yourself looking at screenshots and watching the trailer trying to make sense of what is going on in the game, I don't think you're supposed to. The absurdity present in Must.Eat.Birds. between the concept behind the game, Maximum Bake, and everything in between is a large part of what makes Must.Eat.Birds. so great. At 99¢, Must.Eat.Birds. is a simple and strange game that goes so far off the deep end that you can't help but smile while playing it." -- TouchArcade "We are adamant that you must play Must.Eat.Birds. A buck will buy you a lot in the App Store these days, but this is a shockingly creative game that deserves your attention." (4 out of 4) -- Slide to Play "Aside from being ridiculously fun and cute, the game also screams of polish, from the top notch graphics and amusing faux-Japanese style, to the best soundtrack in any iPhone game I've played. I'll simply never be able to look at baked goods again without wanting to scream "MAXIMUM BAKE!!!!!" It's as simple as this: if you own an iPhone, intend to spend a single dollar on anything non-essential before the introductory sale ends at an unspecified date in the future, and have any interest in smiling or having fun, "Must.Eat.Birds." is a must.own.game. for you." -- Examiner.com "If style and presentation could kill then Media Tonic would be death himself..... {"title": "Need For Cheese (2009)", "title_search": "need for cheese 2009", "title_keyword": "need for cheese 2009", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/need-for-cheese-2009/", "summary": "================================= Online high scores goodness upon us! Submit your crazy scores now! ================================= Short description (see below for the elaborate epic story): Get the cheese, avoid the filthy cats and stay alive as long as you can! Features: * Fun and darn addictive gameplay * Online high scores - submit and compare your score to players in your area * Easy to pick up controls - just tilt your iPhone/iPod Touch to move the mouse * Autosave - you can interrupt a running game at any time and resume it later * Small memory footprint - no need to restart your iPhone/iPod Touch to play * Sweet sound effects and sound track Check out the dazzling trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZQ9cIBnI4GI Elaborate epic story: Aeons ago as the universe was still young and pure an epic battle raged so intense that its mere echo from the depths of the space sparked the creation of this very world like we know it. The nefarious cat kind (the Felinarians) forged a plan so evil and twisted to enslave all life that even the thought of it was able to drive the weak minded insane. The peaceful titans (the cows) bore milk to feed Albigana, the wellspring of life.
